Countach 3D
• Title: Countach 3D
• Genre: 3D Art
• Role: 3D Artist
• Company: Personal Project
• Tech: Maya
Full vehicle modeling project created entirely in Maya, focusing on realistic proportions.

Key Accomplishments

  • Modeled complete car from reference images with accurate proportions
  • Detailed exterior components
  • Applied realistic materials and lighting setups
  • Demonstrated technical proficiency in hard-surface modeling
